channel.title: Guthix Portal Help

item.title: Guthix Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

okay so first i declared these ints at the begnning of my code

public int SaradominTeam = 0;
public int ZamorakTeam = 0;

then i added this tid-bit

if (objectID == 4408 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3089)) //Guthix portal
               {
			   if(castleWarsOn == false) //If Castle Wars aint running
			   {
			   if (ZamorakTeam > SaradominTeam) {
			   teleportToX = 2427;
			   teleportToY = 3077;
			   heightLevel = 1;
			   playerIsSaradomin = true;
			   addItem(4041, 1);
			   wear(4041, getItemSlot(4041));
			   SaradominTeam += 1;
			   sendMessage("You joined the Saradomin Team!");
			   sendMessage("You cannot log out while in castlewars! You must leave and comeback if you do");
			} else if (SaradominTeam > ZamorakTeam) {
				teleportToX = 2372; //Teleport to arena
				teleportToY = 3130; //Teleport to arena
				heightLevel = 1; //Teleport to arena
				playerIsZamorak = true; //Make player Zamorak
				addItem(4042, 1); //Add cloak
				ZamorakTeam += 1;
				sendMessage("You joined the Zamorak Team!");
				sendMessage("You cannot log out while in castlewars! You must leave and comeback if you do");
			} else if (ZamorakTeam == SaradominTeam) {
			float GuthixPortal = java.lang.Math.random(2);
			if (GuthixPortal == 1) {
				teleportToX = 2372; //Teleport to arena
				teleportToY = 3130; //Teleport to arena
				heightLevel = 1; //Teleport to arena
				playerIsZamorak = true; //Make player Zamorak
				addItem(4042, 1); //Add cloak
				ZamorakTeam += 1;
				sendMessage("You joined the Zamorak Team!");
				sendMessage("You cannot log out while in castlewars! You must leave and comeback if you do");
			} else if (GuthixPortal == 2) {
				teleportToX = 2427;
				teleportToY = 3077;
				heightLevel = 1;
				playerIsSaradomin = true;
				addItem(4041, 1);
				wear(4041, getItemSlot(4041));
				SaradominTeam += 1;
				sendMessage("You joined the Saradomin Team!");
				sendMessage("You cannot log out while in castlewars! You must leave and comeback if you do");
			
			}
		}
	}
}

i need to figure out how to apply the random of 1 or 2 to work it says incompatible types if i could get random things down i would be able to pwn in 317’s and you know it’s true lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 06:08:05 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
